title: Why are you nerfing Pyke over Tahm?
body: Why do you annoy me so much, Riot?

replies.body: LOL, tahm is broken, nerf him to the fucking ground, remove his grey health, remove his 4-5 second hard cc

They want pyke to remain as a support pick. 

They are happy with Tahm remaining as a top laner and analysing his new playstyle.
